settlement-roads.midnightconfig.rawNumbe: Select the number of structures to locate. Higher number = longer loading time
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.structur: Select or type the structure you want to locate. E.g., minecraft:village or modid:custom_structure. Allows structure tags and keys.
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.distance: Approximate distance between buoys in blocks
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.title: Countered's Settlement Roads
